===Alternative forms===
* {{zh-l|牛X}}

===Etymology===
Literally the "cross" (the vagina) of a cow. {{zh-l|牛叉}} is an alternative form of {{zh-l|牛逼|cow's cunt}}, a phrase which was possibly influenced by the expression {{zh-l|吹牛皮|chuī niúpí}} which means "to brag".
